channel.title: Miniature fullscreen
channel.description:
hey, after i started making my fullscreen i realised that i didnt like the look of it, after seeing galkons miniature fullscreen i thought ide have a go at making 1 of those. and ile finish my fullscreen after this 1 is finished. or maybe fuse them togethor.
since i started this 1, i have done everything myself no help from anybody. i have even been helpin josh <3, before you say the bottom isnt perfect. im working on 1 bit at a time. so right now i extended gameframe width. and completing mapback. then ile work on chatbox. then tab area.
so here is what i have done _____________ 29th july, 19:26pm _________ minimap (70%) - made minimap a circle (100%) - positioned minimap in correct place (100%) - set clicking areas (100%) - positioned world map(100%) - positioned orbs (20%)
_______________Media___________________ [SPOILER="Media"] [IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/14ty4h1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/a6n7p.png[/img] [/SPOILER] _______________________________________
_______________Credits___________________ Me (100%) swat stewie ares ________________________________________

item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“Bmaw, post:2, topic:291779”]No thanks.[/quote]Stop trying to be cool. You already killed your reputation with fake pictures and by lieing about your gender/age/picture.

item.title: Miniature fullscreen
item.dc:creator: @Hexyl Hexyl
item.description:
@Hexyl wrote:

xx qwertyuiop xx:

The sidebar tab and interface, you know, like the player’s inventory and the buttons used to change to different interfaces.

i ment by this:
Why have a big fullscreen game client when you can have an ugly cluttered mess, right?

and that will go at bottom right, and will be able to close and open it.

Read full topic
